introduce.title: What is PPP Calculator
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: PPP Calculator is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI SaaS startups, including templates, components, and documentation.

items.title: Ready-to-use Templates
items.description: Choose from dozens of production-ready AI SaaS templates to quickly start your project.

items.title: Infrastructure Setup
items.description: Get instant access to scalable infrastructure with best practices built-in.

items.title: Quick Deployment
items.description: Deploy your AI SaaS application to production in hours, not days.

items.title: AI Integration
items.description: Integrate AI into your project with ease using our built-in AI SDK.

benefits.title: Why Choose PPP Calculator
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Get everything you need to launch your AI startup - from ready-to-use templates to technical support.

items.title: Complete Framework
items.description: Built on Next.js with authentication, payments, and AI integration - everything works out of the box.

items.title: Rich Templates Library

items.title: Technical Guidance

items.title: Start Your Project
items.description: Read the documentation and clone the code of PPP Calculator. Start building your AI SaaS startup.

items.title: Customize Your Project
items.description: Modify the template with your data and contents. Specific AI functionality needs.

items.title: Deploy to Production
items.description: Deploy your project to production with a few steps and start serving customers immediately.

brand.title: PPP Calculator
brand.description: PPP Calculator is a SaaS platform that provides AI-powered Purchasing Power Parity information services for users.

converter.title: Purchasing Power Parity Calculator
converter.description: Discover the real purchasing power of your dollars in different countries
converter.footer_tip: Data provided by AI analysis, for reference only
converter.empty_text: Enter an amount and select a country to start
converter.prompt:
As a Purchasing Power Parity (PPP) expert, please convert {amount} USD to the local currency of {country}.

Important: This is a PPP conversion, NOT an exchange rate conversion. Please calculate equivalent purchasing power based on real price levels and cost of living.

For example: The purchasing power of $100 in the US might be equivalent to 300 CNY in China (not the exchange rate of 720 CNY).

Please provide:
1. The equivalent amount based on purchasing power parity (not exchange rate)
2. Currency code (e.g., CNY, JPY, etc.)
3. 5 specific purchasing power comparison examples showing actual price differences for the same products in both countries

Please return in JSON format:
{
  "amount": "converted amount (number only)",
  "currency": "currency code",
  "comparisons": ["example1", "example2", "example3", "example4", "example5"]
}

Note: Return only the JSON, no other text
